item.title: CVE-2023-47527|2023-12-21T14:27:58.606Z -- sajjad%20hossain%20sagor -- wp%20edit%20username
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sajjad Hossain Sagor WP Edit Username allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Edit Username: from n/a through 1.0.5.
